info.name: Flickr - (GM) - Multi Group Sender
info.description: Before the Next Update.... Quick Userstyle Adaptation of Greasemonkey For : GM Script Flickr Multi Group Sender by Steeev . What it does ?: Correct The PopUP Position ..... It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! But You Can Change the values to adapt it to your screen : It's easy : only 2 values to play :-) It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". â–¶ The First one: Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE WIDE
